# radiusBuffer

**Instance Property**

A buffer that contains the curve radius for each control point.

## Declaration

```swift
var radiusBuffer: (any MTLBuffer)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The buffer contains values that are greater than or equal to `0.0` in the format you configure with the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAccelerationStructureCurveGeometryDescriptor/radiusFormat] property. This property needs to have a non-nil value when you build an acceleration structure.
